mapper.select: select * from v_portalpage t1 where portalpageid=#{id}

select * from v_portalpage t1 where portalpageid=#{id}
select * from v_portalpage t1 where portalpageid=#{id}
select * from v_portalpage t1 where portalpageid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLECTX, t1.MEMO, t1.PORTALPAGEID, t1.PORTALPAGEMEMO, t1.PORTALPAGENAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFPORTALPAGE t1
SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENABLECTX`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`PORTALPAGEID`, t1.`PORTALPAGEMEMO`, t1.`PORTALPAGENAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_SRFPORTALPAGE` t1
SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLECTX, t1.MEMO, t1.PORTALPAGEID, t1.PORTALPAGEMEMO, t1.PORTALPAGENAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFPORTALPAGE t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLECTX AS ENABLECTX, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.PORTALPAGEID AS PORTALPAGEID, t1.PORTALPAGEMEMO AS PORTALPAGEMEMO, t1.PORTALPAGENAME AS PORTALPAGENAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFPORTALPAGE t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.ENABLECTX AS ENABLECTX, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.PORTALPAGEID AS PORTALPAGEID, t1.PORTALPAGEMEMO AS PORTALPAGEMEMO, t1.PORTALPAGENAME AS PORTALPAGENAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFPORTALPAGE t1
SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[ENABLECTX], t1.[MEMO], t1.[PORTALPAGEID], t1.[PORTALPAGEMEMO], t1.[PORTALPAGENAME], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN] FROM [T_SRFPORTALPAGE] t1
